mapper.select: select id, uid, sid, title, terminal_id, app_product_id, select_requirements ,select_cause, setting, photo, album, examine, del, create_time, code_path ,industry_id, market_id from zl_application_case where title = #{title} and del = 1
SELECT a.* FROM zl_exhibition_case_map cm,zl_application_case a WHERE cm.exhibition_id=#{id} AND cm.case_id=a.id AND a.del=1

SELECT acs.*,sp.name AS baseMaterial,spt.name terminal,spa.name app_product,IF(c.id>0,1,0) collection FROM ( SELECT a.*,s.name,s.msid FROM zl_application_case a,zl_specification s WHERE a.id=#{id} AND a.del=1 AND a.sid=s.id ) acs LEFT JOIN zl_specification_parameter sp ON sp.id=acs.msid AND sp.class_type=2 LEFT JOIN zl_specification_parameter spt ON spt.id=acs.terminal_id AND spt.class_type=8 LEFT JOIN zl_specification_parameter spa ON spa.id=acs.app_product_id AND spa.class_type=9 LEFT JOIN zl_collection c ON acs.id=c.iid AND c.type=2 AND c.uid=#{uid}

SELECT a.id,a.title,a.create_time createTime,a.hot, s.name specificationName,c.company,zsp01.name industryName,zsp02.name markerName,zsp03.name baseMaterial,zsp04.name appProductName FROM zl_application_case a LEFT JOIN zl_specification s ON a.sid=s.id LEFT JOIN zl_customer c ON s.mid=c.id LEFT JOIN zl_specification_parameter zsp01 ON zsp01.id=a.industry_id AND zsp01.class_type=6 LEFT JOIN zl_specification_parameter zsp02 ON zsp02.id=a.market_id AND zsp02.class_type=7 LEFT JOIN zl_specification_parameter zsp03 ON zsp03.id=s.msid AND zsp03.class_type=2 LEFT JOIN zl_specification_parameter zsp04 ON zsp04.id=a.app_product_id AND zsp04.class_type=9 where a.del = 1
and a.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%')
ORDER BY a.hot desc,a.id desc

SELECT c.id uid, a.id, a.sid, a.title, a.industry_id industryId, a.market_id marketId, a.select_requirements selectRequirements, a.select_cause selectCause, a.setting, a.photo, a.album,a.del, zp01.name terminal,zp02.name appProduct FROM zl_application_case a LEFT JOIN zl_specification s ON a.sid=s.id LEFT JOIN zl_customer c ON c.id=s.mid LEFT JOIN zl_specification_parameter zp01 ON zp01.id=a.terminal_id AND zp01.class_type=8 LEFT JOIN zl_specification_parameter zp02 ON zp02.id=a.app_product_id AND zp02.class_type=9 WHERE a.id=#{id}

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.photo, sp01.name terminal, s.name, IF(c.id > 0,1,0) collect FROM zl_application_case a LEFT JOIN zl_specification_parameter sp01 ON a.terminal_id=sp01.id AND sp01.class_type = 8 LEFT JOIN zl_specification s ON a.sid = s.id AND s.del = 1 LEFT JOIN zl_collection c ON c.iid = a.id AND c.type = 2 AND c.uid = #{uid}
LEFT JOIN zl_customer cu ON s.mid = cu.id
LEFT JOIN zl_specification_parameter sp02 ON s.tid = sp02.id
LEFT JOIN zl_specification_parameter sp03 ON s.msid = sp03.id
LEFT JOIN zl_specification_parameter sp04 ON a.industry_id = sp04.id
LEFT JOIN zl_specification_parameter sp05 ON a.app_product_id = sp05.id
WHERE a.del=1
AND s.mid IN (${mids}) AND cu.role = 2
AND s.tid IN(${tids}) AND sp02.class_type = 1
AND s.msid IN(${msid}) AND sp03.class_type = 2
AND a.industry_id IN(${industryIds}) AND sp04.class_type = 6
AND sp05.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') AND sp05.class_type = 9
SELECT a.id, a.photo, a.title, s.name FROM zl_application_case a LEFT JOIN zl_specification s ON a.sid=s.id AND s.del=1 WHERE a.del=1 AND a.hot=1 ORDER BY a.id DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT q.id,q.title,q.create_time createTime,c.nickname FROM zl_questions q LEFT JOIN zl_customer c ON q.uid=c.id AND c.del=1 WHERE iid = #{id} AND info_class = 2 AND examine = 1 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 4
SELECT content FROM zl_answer WHERE qid = #{id} AND examine = 1 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
select count(1) from zl_application_case where hot = 1

(SELECT ce.create_time createTime,ce.examine,c.id,c.title,IF(ce.id>0,0,1) make FROM zl_case_edit ce LEFT JOIN zl_application_case c ON ce.aid=c.id AND c.del=1 WHERE ce.uid=#{id} ORDER BY ce.id DESC LIMIT 9999999) UNION (SELECT a.create_time createTime,a.examine,a.id,a.title,IF(a.id>0,1,0) FROM zl_application_case a WHERE a.del=1 AND a.uid=#{id} ORDER BY a.id DESC LIMIT 9999999)
